title: Would Zed not've retitled the Kinkou monastery now that its his?
body:
Just a haphazard thought that popped into my mind.

If the old teachings of the Monastery stood as a symbol to what Zed believes is impotence, and he generally wants nothing to do with Kusho's philosophy then why maintain the monastery's traditional name? Cut literally all ties, because its not like the Order of Shadows are trying to masquerade as the Kinkou.

replies.body:
Absolutely - Zed would not stand for that at all.

However, due to one thing and another, and being really busy with the whole shadow magic thing, he forgot to set up mail forwarding for the temple, so he still keeps getting all of Kusho's unpaid bill reminders! Nightmare! One time, debt collectors turned up about those lease payments on the SUV, and let me tell you now - that was one SERIOUSLY awkward conversation at the front door...

Don't worry though, they sorted it all out. Well... I mean, Zed just killed the guys. Basically the same thing, right?

He's definitely, definitely going to get around to painting the fence, too. Just stop going on about it! Dude works for a living, you know.

how does Zed even get cash for food and stuff for his acolytes?
or do they catch their own meals like hunting and fishing?

Can Zed ever just go to a nice hotel and order some Ramen like how Shen did in the Jhin story?
The wait lines for ramen are so long, Zed gets his delivered instead by his prospective acolytes. They are known as "interns."
{{champion:141}} official title during conception: Kayn, intern of shadows

why not just have a shadow wait in line then swap with it when it was his number?
also is Zed a Fish,Pork or Beef kinda guy?

On a more serious note I've got some other questions:

Does Zed know Kennen is a Yordle? could he ever see though his Glamour magic?
Does Akali know of Kennens True nature considering they seemed pretty close buddies and got along well but then again Akali seems to think of him as more of a kid?
Shen probably knows cuz he has the whole spirit vision thing going on but I wonder about the others.
Who's faster. Master Yi or the Ninja's?

whats the percentage of Vastayan to human population in Ionia? is it 30% Vastayan 70% human? From the story they are said to be kinda endangered but they appear in every other story and there seems to be a wide range of them.
